name: Voodoo Child
description:
Voodoo Child is a sailing simulator that I adapted for the Leap Motion 3D Jam. It should be noted that it was a work in progress prior to the jam. You can use an Dev Kit 1 model of the Oculus Rift to play it. However, there is a version for those who don't have a rift. The music used is "Satellite Anthem Icarus" by Boards of Canada. I do not own the rights to the music, it belongs to its rightful owners. No copyright infringement intended.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to look around

Use with Leap Motion, placed between screen and player

Grab and turn the tiller to steer your ship

Thanks for playing :)

-Pierce
